description:
Whether you're braving a sudden downpour or basking in the sun, this bucket hat is designed to keep you comfortable and dry throughout your journey. With UPF50+ sun protection, moisture-wicking capabilities, and a crushable design, it's the ideal addition to your outdoor gear collection.

  • HYDROMAXX 2.0 Waterproof fabric to shield you from rain and moisture
  • UPF50+ sun protection, keeping you safe from harmful UV rays
  • Mesh lining for enhanced breathability, allowing you to stay cool and fresh
  • Crushable, making it easy to pack and take with you on all your adventures
